${ModID}:FastMovementsPower.NAME: Fast Movements
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b
for each card less than 3 in your hand

${ModID}:InTheRhythmPower.NAME: In The Rhythm
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you discard a card, gain #b

${ModID}:ChickenPower.NAME: Chicken Scratch
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next #b

${ModID}:BusPower.NAME: Riding the Bus
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, discard your leftmost

${ModID}:BusPower2.NAME: Riding the Bus, Backwards
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, discard your rightmost
